alert.note: Alert for Clark (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:14AM EDT until July 17 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clark County in south central Indiana... Oldham County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Shelby County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Henry County in central Kentucky... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 214 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over La Grange, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, La Grange, New Castle, Pendleton, Crestwood, Eminence, Pewee Valley, Owen, Goshen and Smithfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
